name: Magi: Venandi
description:
This game was made for LowRezJam2020  by Roberto Romao

Musics by Eric Matyas  
www.soundimage.org

Special Thanks to Caliber Mengsk

for his incredible font :D

---------------------------------------------------

x_X and omg! How hard it was! I hope you enjoy it!

Controls:
navigate the menus  W/S 
select J back K

Game play
WASD to move the character 
I to open the Inventory/Character page
on the character page, W/S to navigate  J to apply the stat points!
Q/E to navigate through the pages


The game will auto-save so, don't worry about that! But only one save so .... (: 

---------------------------
